name: Hockey
overview: Hockey is a 2 - 4 player ice hockey game for the Atari 400/800. A 3 - on - 3 ice hockey game for 2 - 4 players. Allows multiple different time frames per period to control the length of game. Each player controls one player on the ice at a time, and can pass or shoot. The player who next gets the puck becomes the active player. The defensive player can intercept passes or shots, and can take the puck away from the player who has the puck. At the end of regulation time, the player with the most points wins. If it is a tie, the players go to sudden death overtime.
